title: HELP My Google Pixel 1 XL won't turn on
content:
I've been using my phone normally, suddenly my phone froze, so i've had to do hard reboot holding power button for some time. Now i can't reboot my phone, it looks like hard bricked. This device wasn't affected with root, bootloader unlock and so on. 
After plugging into computer it gives me this typical usb connected sound on windows. Pop up says that usb device cannot be recognize.

Please help.
